dict.acceptation: 完全地；完整地；全部地；彻底地；

sent.orig: It is an entirely different style of behavior, arising out of entirely different ste of attitudes.
sent.trans: 它是一种完全不同的行为风格，源于截然不同的一类态度。

sent.orig: The modern Icelandic whaling industry was entirely for meat and almost entirely for export.
sent.trans: 现代冰岛的捕鲸工业的唯一目的完全是为了获取鲸肉，并且几乎全部用于出口。

sent.orig: The open fields in the city have now been entirely built in.
sent.trans: 城里的那些旷野现在全都有建筑物了。

sent.orig: If I were you, whatever I did should be done at my own discretion entirely.
sent.trans: 如果我是你，凡事我都要自己裁决。

sent.orig: This matter is entirely possible that a similar prevalence and severity of the situation.
sent.trans: 这件事情完全可以证明类似情况的普遍性和严重性。
